text: aur jis din kuphphaar jahannum ke saamane laen jaenge (to unase kaha jaega ki) tumane apanee duniya kee zindagee mein apane maze uda chuke aur usamen khoob chain kar chuke to aaj tum par zillat ka azaab kiya jaega isalie ki tum apanee zameen mein akada karate the aur isalie ki tum badakaariyaan karate the
